enabled.description: indicate if ServiceDictHandler is enabled or not

mapping.description:
mapping from 'pathPrefix@requestMethod' to serviceIds
The following are examples in values.yml
  /v1/address@get: party.address-1.0.0
  /v2/address@get: party.address-2.0.0
  /v1/contact@post: party.contact-1.0.0
